text: Thanks so much and <@U03KAK3R4GY> and <@U058ZPH175H>! My gut told me this would not be the best choice for our use case and based on what you've said here I just don't think we really need a HubSpot based intranet. We don't even use HubSpot as a CRM (we use it purely for marketing) and use Dynamics as our CRM. Thanks for your input.
